Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Prohibits the approval of licenses for certain alcohol and substance abuse programs within five hundred feet of a school, public park, or church, synagogue, or other place of worship
Summary: Prohibits the approval of licenses for alcoholism programs, substance abuse programs, and chemical dependence programs within five hundred feet of a school, public park, or church, synagogue, or other place of worship.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.21, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to prohibiting the approval of licenses for alcoholism programs, substance abuse programs, and chemical dependence programs within five hundred feet of a school, public park, or church, synagogue, or other place of worship
